section.para: Zend_Application_Resource_Dojo can be used to configure the Zend_Dojo viewhelpers.

example.para: Below is a sample INI file showing how Zend_Dojo can be enabled.
example.programlisting: resources.dojo.enable = true ; Always load the Dojo javascript files
example.para: The Zend_Dojo resource plugin utilises the options for the Zend_Dojo_View_Helper_Dojo_Container::setOptions() to configure the viewhelpers. Please see the Zend_Dojo chapter for full descriptions and available options.
